CustomField.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-008022
This formula field is used to display the Status of the Softrax Assets the same way they appear in the Softrax Application user interface. The database stores the values as "A" for active records and "I" for inactive records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the Status of the Softrax Assets the same way it appears in the Softrax Application.
CustomField.label: Status
